summary: Adds a follower based on history\'s most famous thief, Robin Hood.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a follower in Riverwood Inn based on History\'s most famous thief, Robin Hood. He\'ll level with the player from 5 up to 55. He carries an ebony bow with matching arrows, a steel sword, and a shield. He is also marriable. 

Since this is my first mod, feedback would be much appreciated. Eventually he will be part of a questline with more characters with ties to the thieve\'s guild questline.
author: LordSarcasm
